name: Cozy At Last
description:
A simple game about getting cozy at home.

Try to unlock all of the achievements!

If you get buggy audio in the web version, you can download a native version, or you can try this mirror, which has threads enabled:

https://nisovin.com/cozy

Controls

A/D or arrow keys to move
E or Space to interact

Credits

I didn't have time to put together a nice credits list, so here's a raw list.
